H1.text: how many super bowl games has the patriots played in. 12

H2.text: how many super bowl games has the patriots played in. 5

H3.text: how many super bowl games has the patriots played in. 10

A4.text: The Patriots extended their record to ten Super Bowl appearances in the 2017–18 playoffs but lost to the Philadelphia Eagles in Super Bowl LII.

A5.text: The Patriots returned to the championship game for a third consecutive season in Super Bowl LIII, where they defeated the Los Angeles Rams 13–3 to win their sixth Super Bowl.
